divs: Sighting Details 1. I was driving on 80 east through desert Nevada near the border 2. The clouds were moving very rapidly(60mph) and we noticed the object was not moving at all which you can see through the photograph 3. A UFO 4. It was just sitting there while the other clouds were moving around it. To the naked eye you could see the outlines of the ship if you zoom in on the picture you can see it somewhat also 5. We continued driving and photographing it 6. Just kept driving it never moved once!
